testsuite.name: As a tool manager, I want ability add attachment file to News item, so that I can delivery it along with News

testcase.name: The file can be uploaded is document file such as pdf, doc*, xls* and has max length is 2MB
The list of files is displayed with corresponding file icon
The uploaded file can removable after confirmed
